name: EYE (rebootFROG)
description:
A tiny spooky game where you press combinations of icons to make things happen... Though you probably shouldn't.

This was originally made for a mini Ludum Dare in 2014 with the theme "non human player". It's since been expanded and updated to work with ruffle flash emulation and touch screens.

Play for free in your browser or pay $1 to get 32bit standalone versions for Windows and Mac and the theme music as an mp3 and flac.

Enjoy!
